title: A Dutch peasant wedding in 1927 in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]

sources.title: A Dutch peasant wedding in 1927 in color! [A.I. enhanced & colorized]
sources.description: Highly interesing images of a peasant wedding in The Netherlands nearly a century ago. Everyone is dressed in traditional costume of the province of Friesland. The original B&W film has been motion-stabilized, speed-corrected, upscaled, restored and artificially colorized with modern A.I. video software. Nice music has also been added. Source: Beeld en Geluid.
